item.title: [317][Shard]Easter Ring 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @LoD LoD
item.description:
@LoD wrote:

Here is my code:
case 7927:
int npc = Integer.parseInt(WearItem());
npcId2 = 3689;
client.npcId2 = npc;
client.isNpc = true;
client.updateRequired = true;
client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
return;

And the error:
server\model\player\packet\WearItem.java:46: cannot find symbol
symbol : method WearItem()
location: class server.model.player.packet.WearItem
int npc = Integer.parseInt(WearItem());
^
server\model\player\packet\WearItem.java:47: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable npcId2
location: class server.model.player.packet.WearItem
npcId2 = 3689;
^
2 errors

Can anyone help me?:\
